name: Sushi Factory (Slide Puzzle)
description:
Available on # SUPER CUTE SLIDE SUSHI PUZZLE

Enjoy this super cute sushi puzzle!

Put sushi on a plate to serve your guests and earn money!

Solve puzzles to collect sushi recipes and upgrade to the beautiful interior!

# FEATURES
  • Puzzles that can be played easily with one hand
  • From very simple levels to ultimate puzzling diffult levels
  • Simple and cute chefs with special skills
  • 70+ cute and lovely sushi characters
  • Customizable restaurant interior with many possible combinations
  • Today's menu with five levels a day
# DESCRIPTION
  • Slide the chef and push the sushi on the plate.
  • You can earn money by putting all the sushis to plates.
  • If you upgrade your interior, it keep earning tips while you’re playing or not.
  • Clear stage and collect stars to learn new recipes.
  • Making a lot of sushi improves your cooking skills, making it a highly priced sushi.
  • If the level is too difficult, try to use 3 kinds of help items anytime!
  • Chefs can be obtained by completing missions, but can also be purchased with coins.
  • Today's menu have lots of rewards, so you should check it every day.

Get this cute little puzzle game that will improve your head and make you fall in love with cuteness.

Make the sushi factory, that sushi master has given to you, the best sushi restaurant ever!

Need Help? Have Questions?
We value your feedback! Please contact us at games@unit5soft.com

This game supports 'English', '한국어', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'Italian', 'Portuguese', 'Indonesian', 'Русский', 'Turkish', 'ไทย', 'Tiếng Việt'.
